snippet.title: Werewolf: The Apocalypse — Purgatory | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Face the beast within and forge your destiny in this narrative World of Darkness RPG. Play as the werewolf refugee Samira and investigate corruption, murder and spiritual decay. Your choices will affect who you were, who you are, how you fight and who you will become. How will your story unfold? Wishlist now ➡️ https://s.team/a/2463980
